name: wavegl
description: Generate Audio in the GPU and stream to the Audio Card

scripts.build: mkdir -p build; npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.watch: mkdir -p build; npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.build-js: browserify -t glslifyify -t [ reactify --extension js ] src/index.js | uglifyjs -mc > build/index.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify -t glslifyify -t [ reactify --extension js ] src/index.js -o build/index.js -dv
